```{r}
library(dplyr)
urls = c('http://data.insideairbnb.com/united-states/ny/new-york-city/2022-06-03/visualisations/listings.csv', 'http://data.insideairbnb.com/united-states/ny/new-york-city/2022-09-07/visualisations/listings.csv')

New_York_City <- lapply(urls, read.csv)
```

```{r}
##before
NYC_before <- New_York_City[[1]]
time <- 0
cbind(NYC_before, time)
NYC_0 <- NYC_before %>% group_by(host_id) %>% summarise(price, time)

##after
NYC_after <- New_York_City[[2]]
time <- 1
cbind(NYC_before, time)
NYC_1 <- NYC_after %>% group_by(host_id) %>% summarise(price, time)

##merge HERE HAS SOME PROBLEM 
NYC <- merge(NYC_0,NYC_1,by="host_id",,all=T)

## still need a column "state" and a column "city" 
```
